cards.notes:
So far

Returning Mechanics
Blood Tokens (Black red?)
Madness (Blue Red)
Transform

New Mechanics
Insight: "Increase your Insight" (You get an insight counter. Whenever you get an insight, you lose life equal to the number of insight counters you have. At 3 counters, you surveil 1 in your upkeep. At 6 counters, you draw an additional card in your draw step.)
[Hunt for Paleblood]: An ability word that is active if a player has gained life and a player has lost life this turn.
Chalice Dungeon (Considering this one. but Dungeons are a contentious mechanic in MTG)
Endless Nightmare (when this creature dies you you may exile it to create a token copy of it that is an enchantment instead of its other types)
Coldblood: tokens that tap and sac to add 2 colorless mana that cant be spent to cast spells from hand". So abilities, flashback, and madness etc.
Commune with [great one name] : if you dont control a great one you may create a [name] token. Then commune with a great one. (They are token enchantments that do things when communed with)
Otherworldy: An ability word that triggers when a token enters under your control. (like landfall, but tokens entering instead of lands)

Archetypes (So far)
Transforming Equipment (Trick Weapons) -RWu
- Equipment
- Activated Abilities

Transforming Monsters (Insight) — RGu
- Insight
- Transform triggers

Hunters (Hunt for Paleblood) — GBr
- Hunt for Paleblood
- Fight/Bite/Creatures dealing damage to eachother
- Venture

The Great Ones(big insight) — UBg
- Insight
- Artifact Sac

The Healing Church (tokens) — GWr
- Otherworldly
- Tokens

The School of Mensis (Madness) — RUb
- Madness discard
- Cast from somewhere other than hand

The Great Ones (Commune bigger) — UGw
- Commune
- Enchantress
- Otherworldly

The Chalice Dungeon (blood and dungeons) — BRw
- Venture
- Blood Tokens
- Madness

Hunters of Hunters??? — BWg
- Hunt for Paleblood
- Venture

Cainhurst — UWb
- Artifacts Matter
-
